enumValues.name: ok
enumValues.description: The operation complete successfully.

enumValues.name: cancelled
enumValues.description: The operation was cancelled.

enumValues.name: unknown
enumValues.description: An unknown error occurred.

enumValues.name: invalid_argument
enumValues.description: An invalid argument was specified.

enumValues.name: deadline_exceeded
enumValues.description: The deadline expired before the operation could complete.

enumValues.name: not_found
enumValues.description: Some requested entity was not found.

enumValues.name: already_exists
enumValues.description: The entity that a user attempted to create already exists.

enumValues.name: permission_denied
enumValues.description: You do not have permission to execute the specified operation.

enumValues.name: resource_exhausted
enumValues.description: Some resources have been exhausted.

enumValues.name: failed_precondition
enumValues.description: The operation was rejected because the device or the app is not in a state required for the operation's execution.

enumValues.name: aborted
enumValues.description: The operation was aborted, typically due to a concurrency issue such as a sequencer check failure or transaction abort.

enumValues.name: out_of_range
enumValues.description: The operation was attempted past the valid range.

enumValues.name: unimplemented
enumValues.description: The operation is not implemented or is not supported/enabled in the device or the app.

enumValues.name: internal
enumValues.description: Internal errors. Some invariants expected by the underlying system have been broken.

enumValues.name: unavailable
enumValues.description: The operation is currently unavailable. This is most likely a transient condition, which can be resolved by retrying with a backoff.

enumValues.name: data_loss
enumValues.description: Unrecoverable data loss or corruption occurred.

enumValues.name: unauthenticated
enumValues.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

enumValues.name: critical
enumValues.description: Use this level to prompt the user to take the immediate action. The Edge App might be entering an unrecoverable state. (However, I believe you currently have no cases that require this level.)

enumValues.name: error
enumValues.description: Use this level to prompt the user to take action to restore the Edge App to its normal state. Otherwise, the app may repeat the same error. e.g., The request for an access token has been rejected by the Token Provider.

enumValues.name: warn
enumValues.description: Use this level to inform the user that an error has occurred, but the Edge App has returned to its normal state. The user should assess whether the error is acceptable and may need to take an action. e.g., A frame drop has occurred.

enumValues.name: info
enumValues.description: Use this level to inform the user about the Edge App’s behavior. Provide only essential details to avoid confusing them.

enumValues.name: debug
enumValues.description: Use this level to provide developers with insights into the Edge App's behavior. Ensure not to include any confidential information.

enumValues.name: trace
enumValues.description: Use this level to mark the entry and exit points of functions, regions of processes, or branches. Be aware that this will significantly increase the size of the log. Ensure not to include any confidential information.

fields.name: number_of_iterations
fields.description: Number of executing onIterate(). Like as NumberOfImages. Default:0 = unlimited, continuous.

fields.name: pq_settings
fields.description: pqSetting to set from cloud and to use in device.

fields.name: camera_image_size
fields.description: The size of the camera images, which is also used as the coodinate for transformation operations.

fields.name: scaling_policy
fields.description: This determines which factor is prioritized when scaling is necessary to achive the desired image size.

fields.name: frame_rate
fields.description: The frame rate at which the sensor outputs images.

fields.name: digital_zoom
fields.description: The magnification value for digital zooming, which affects the output images.

fields.name: auto_exposure
fields.description: Those values are interpreted only when the 'exposureMode' is set to 'auto'.

fields.name: max_exposure_time
fields.description: The maximum time in microseconds that the auto exposure keeps the shutter open, up to the period based on the 'frameRate'.

fields.name: min_exposure_time
fields.description: The minimum time in microseconds that the auto exposure keeps the shutter open. This must be less than or equal to the 'max_exposure_time'.

fields.name: max_gain
fields.description: The maminimum gain value in dB that the auto exposure sets.

fields.name: convergence_speed
fields.description: The convergence frame number for 6dB change in brightness.

fields.name: auto_exposure_metering
fields.description: Specify the mode of the auto exposure metering setting and the metering area.

fields.name: metering_mode
fields.description: Specify the metering mode.

enumValues.name: full_screen
enumValues.description: Meter averaging over the entire camera image.

enumValues.name: user_window
enumValues.description: Meter within the range specified by parameter.

fields.name: ev_compensation
fields.description: The exposure compensation value. This value is interpreted only when the 'exposureMode' is set to 'auto'.

fields.name: ae_anti_flicker_mode
fields.description: This enables the anti-flikering functionality of the auto exposure.

enumValues.name: freq_50hz
enumValues.description: Choose this option when the light source operates at a frequency of 50Hz.

enumValues.name: freq_60hz
enumValues.description: Choose this option when the light source operates at a frequency of 60Hz.

fields.name: manual_exposure
fields.description: Those values are interpreted only when the 'exposureMode' is set to 'manual'.

fields.name: exposure_time
fields.description: The time in microseconds the shutter is kept open.

fields.name: gain
fields.description: The exposure gain value in dB.

fields.name: auto_white_balance
fields.description: This values is interpreted only when the 'whiteBalanceMode' is set to 'auto'.

fields.name: convergence_speed
fields.description: The convergence frame number for changing from 4300K to 5600K.

fields.name: manual_white_balance_preset
fields.description: This values is interpreted only when the 'whiteBalanceMode' is set to 'preset'.

fields.name: image_cropping
fields.description: The cropping boundary used to generate input tensor images for the IMX500 DNN processor. The coordinate is based on the 'imageSize'.

fields.name: image_rotation
fields.description: The rotation angle of the input tensor images for the IMX500 DNN processor.

fields.name: register_access
fields.description: This property directly accesses the registers which a stream supports.

enumValues.name: by_8bit
enumValues.description: Access to the register by 8 bit.

enumValues.name: by_16bit
enumValues.description: Access to the register by 16 bit.

enumValues.name: by_32bit
enumValues.description: Access to the register by 32 bit.

enumValues.name: by_64bit
enumValues.description: Access to the register by 64 bit.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An ID of the register to access. A stream defines the target to which the register ID points.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Please enter in hexadecimal without 0x.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Please enter in decimal.

fields.name: port_settings
fields.description: transport settings defined by Edge App Developer.

schema.description: If you want to upload inference result, 'metadata' field should be included in the fields. If you want to upload inference image, 'input_tensor' field should be included in the fields.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: For port setting of inference result, 'name' parameter should be set 'metadata'.

schema.description: If you want to upload inference result, 'metadata' field should be included in fields of port_settings. If you want to upload inference image, 'input_tensor' field should be included in fields of port_settings. If you want to upload inference result and inference image, 'metadata' and 'input_tensor' field should be included in fields of port_settings.

enumValues.name: evp_telemetry
enumValues.description: MQTT.

fields.name: storage_name
fields.description: This is used when the 'method' is set to 'blob_storage'.

fields.name: endpoint
fields.description: This is required when the 'method' is set to 'http_storage'.

fields.name: path
fields.description: This is required when the 'method' is set to 'http_storage'. This is used when the 'method' is set to 'blob_storage'.

fields.name: input_tensor
fields.description: For port setting of inference image, 'name' parameter should be set 'input_tensor'.

schema.description: If you want to upload inference result, 'metadata' field should be included in fields of port_settings. If you want to upload inference image, 'input_tensor' field should be included in fields of port_settings. If you want to upload inference result and inference image, 'metadata' and 'input_tensor' field should be included in fields of port_settings.

enumValues.name: evp_telemetry
enumValues.description: MQTT.

fields.name: storage_name
fields.description: This is used when the 'method' is set to 'blob_storage'.

fields.name: endpoint
fields.description: This is required when the 'method' is set to 'http_storage'.

fields.name: path
fields.description: This is required when the 'method' is set to 'http_storage'. This is used when the 'method' is set to 'blob_storage'.

enumValues.name: raw_data
enumValues.description: Uploaded file name will be .bin

enumValues.name: JPEG
enumValues.description: Uploaded file name will be .jpg

enumValues.name: BMP
enumValues.description: Uploaded file name will be .bmp

fields.name: number_of_inference_per_message
fields.description: Number of inference results to include in one message. Default:1
